mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mount Vernon, the Residence of George Washington.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: E. & H.T. Anthony (Firm)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of the Mount Vernon Mansion from the northeast in a dilapidated state as evidenced by ship masts holding up the piazza. Several saplings have barriers built around the trunks. Mounted on yellow board. A label affixed to the back of the cardboard mount reads: “Mount Vernon, the Residence of George Washington.” Anthony’s Stereoscopic Views. No. 1414. Published by E. & H. T. Anthony & Co., Emporium of American and Foreign Stereoscopic Views, Chromos and Albums, 591 Broadway, opposite Metropolitan Hotel, New York, c. 1859.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
